# hyperping_incident (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve information about a specific Hyperping incident by its ID.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique identifier (UUID) of the incident to look up.

### Read-Only

- `affected_components` (List of String) List of component UUIDs affected by this incident.
- `date` (String) The date of the incident in ISO 8601 format.
- `status_pages` (List of String) List of status page UUIDs this incident is displayed on.
- `text` (String) The description text of the incident (English).
- `title` (String) The title of the incident (English).
- `type` (String) The type of incident (`outage` or `incident`).
- `updates` (Attributes List) List of updates for this incident. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--updates))

<a id="nestedatt--updates"></a>
### Nested Schema for `updates`

Read-Only:

- `date` (String) The date of the update.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the update.
- `text` (String) The text content of the update (English).
- `type` (String) The type of update.
